    • Method Detail

      • isCrpControlledPublication

        public static boolean isCrpControlledPublication​(com.jalios.jcms.Publication pub)
        Check if the specified publication is controlled by CRP policy.

        That is, it has at least one category, which belongs to the publication's workspace, and for which category propagate right is enabled (on the category or its ancestors).

        Note : for security reason, value of update instance are not used, and are resolved to the original publication.

        Parameters:
        pub - a publication to check
        Returns:
        true if publication is protected by CRP policy (regarding read, use and manage right), false if default JPlatform policies applies.
        Since:
        3.0 / CRP-24

      • isCrpControlledPublication

        public static boolean isCrpControlledPublication​(com.jalios.jcms.Publication pub,
                                                 boolean checkOriginalPub)
        Check if the specified publication is controlled by CRP policy.

        That is, it has at least one category, which belongs to the publication's workspace, and for which category propagate right is enabled (on the category or its ancestors).

        Note : for security reason, value of update instance are not used, and are resolved to the original publication.

        Parameters:
        pub - a publication to check
        checkOriginalPub - set to false to check the specified publication instance, set to true to check the stored publication
        Returns:
        true if publication is protected by CRP policy (regarding read, use and manage right), false if default JPlatform policies applies.
        Since:
        3.0 / CRP-24

      • isPropagateReadRightsEnabled

        public static boolean isPropagateReadRightsEnabled​(com.jalios.jcms.Category cat)
        Check if propagation of READ rights option is enabled for the specified category or any of its ancestors.

        This method checks that the specified Category is an axis defined in plugin properties or any of its children.

        Warning It DOES NOT check if category propagates read/use and manage rights through new CRP policy introduced in version 3.0 through CRP-24 for this usage, use isPropagateRightsEnabled(Category)

        Parameters:
        cat - a Category
        Returns:
        true if READ right is propagated using historical CRP behavior, false otherwise
        Since:
        3.0
        See Also:
        isPropagateRightsEnabled(Category)

      • isPropagateRightsEnabled

        public static boolean isPropagateRightsEnabled​(com.jalios.jcms.Category cat)
        Check if propagation of READ, USE and MANAGE rights is enabled for the specified category or any of its ancestors

        This method checks the corresponding option (an extradata) is set on the Category or any of its parent.

        Warning : It DOES NOT check if category is one of the category axis configured in the plugin (or one of its descendant), for this usage, use isPropagateReadRightsEnabled(Category)

        Parameters:
        cat - a Category
        Returns:
        true if READ/USE/MANAGE rights is propagated to publication (CRP 3.0 feature), false otherwise
        Since:
        3.0 / CRP-24
        See Also:
        isPropagateReadRightsEnabled(Category)

      • isPropagateRightsEnabled

        public static boolean isPropagateRightsEnabled​(com.jalios.jcms.Category cat,
                                               boolean checkAncestor)
        Check if propagation of READ, USE and MANAGE rights is enabled for the specified category, and optionally its ancestors.

        This method checks the corresponding option (an extradata) is set on the Category and optionally its ancestors.

        Warning : It DOES NOT check if category is one of the category axis configured in the plugin (or one of its descendant), for this usage, use isPropagateReadRightsEnabled(Category)

        Parameters:
        cat - a Category
        checkAncestor - set to true to also check any ancestor of the specified category, set to false to only check this category
        Returns:
        true if READ/USE/MANAGE rights is propagated to publication (CRP 3.0 feature), false otherwise
        Since:
        3.0 / CRP-24
        See Also:
        isPropagateReadRightsEnabled(Category)

      • isWorkspaceAdmin

        public static boolean isWorkspaceAdmin​(com.jalios.jcms.Member verifiedMbr,
                                       com.jalios.jcms.Category category)
        Check if the specified Member is a workspace admin of any workspace using the category
        Parameters:
        verifiedMbr - the member to verify
        category - the category used to look for any associated workspace
        Returns:
        true if specified Member is admin of a workspace referencing the category, false otherwise
